segments.text: To which gate do I need to go to catch connecting flight 707 to New York City ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Go to Gate 56 , the plane is now boarding , you must hurry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Show me the fastest way to get there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Instead of walking you can take this shuttle to get you there faster .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think the plane will leave without me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I will call the attendants at the gate . I'll tell them you are on your way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you so much , I would really appreciate that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're welcome , have a safe trip .
segments.speaker: S2
